titles.title: A resolution relating to the designation of a Senator to hold the office of Deputy President pro tempore of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/28/1987--Introduced. Provides that the Senate may designate a Senator to serve as Deputy President pro tempore during the 100th Congress in addition to Senators who hold such office under the authority of S. Res. 17, 95th Congress (agreed to January 10, 1977). (S. Res. 17 provides that any Member of the Senate who has held the office of President or Vice President of the United States shall be a Deputy President pro tempore.)
